summary: A test suite that validates the SabreLayout optimization pass, checking that it produces correct qubit layouts for circuits of different sizes and coupling maps, handles partial and targetâ€‘specified layouts, manages multiple search attempts, and correctly incorporates classical bits.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of the SabreLayout mapping algorithm so that quantum programs can be reliably compiled to hardware constraints, reducing errors and improving execution fidelity.
